title: ICAI Releases Admit Cards for CA Foundation, Intermediate, and Final January 2026 Examinations
content:
# ICAI Releases Admit Cards for CA Foundation, Intermediate, and Final January 2026 Examinations

Ek important update hai! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne CA Foundation, Intermediate, aur Final January 2026 Examinations ke admit cards release kar diye hain.

Candidates ab apne respective admit cards download kar sakte hain.

*   **Release Date:** Admit cards 18th December 2025 ko jaari kiye gaye hain.
*   **Exams Covered:** Yeh admit cards CA Foundation, Intermediate, aur Final teeno levels ke liye available hain.
*   **How to Download:** Aapko ICAI ke Self Service Portal (SSP) par login karke apna admit card download karna hoga.
*   **Important Points:**
    *   Apne SSP login credentials (User ID aur password) use karke download karein.
    *   Exam hall mein entry ke liye color printout mandatory hai, black and white copy allow nahi hogi.
    *   Admit card mein apni details (name, registration number, exam centre, photo, signature) carefully check kar lein. Koi discrepancy hone par immediately ICAI exam helpdesk se contact karein.
    *   Exams 5th January 2026 se shuru hokar 24th January 2026 tak chalenge.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://eservices.icai.org/)

*Published on: 20 December 2025*
